meanings.definition: A condiment made of fruits or vegetables with vinegar, sugar, and spices.
meanings.sent1: I love to add chutnees to my sandwiches for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The chutnees added a delicious tanginess to the curry.
meanings.sent3: The chutnees danced on my taste buds with a sweet and sour melody.
meanings.sent4: Her chutnees of wisdom seasoned the conversation with insight.
meanings.sent5: The chutnees sparkled on the plate like a jewel of flavor.

meanings.definition: To preserve or season with chutney.
meanings.sent1: She decided to chutnees the mangoes to enjoy them all year round.
meanings.sent2: The chef will chutnees the meat with a special blend of spices.
meanings.sent3: He chutneesed the story with humor to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The memories were chutneesed in his heart forever.
meanings.sent5: The artist chutneesed the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A dish of Indian origin made of fruits or vegetables with vinegar, sugar, and spices.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delicious chutnees as an appetizer.
meanings.sent2: She learned to make traditional chutnees from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The chutnees on the table disappeared quickly during the party.
meanings.sent4: The chutnees of flavors in the dish surprised her taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chutnees filled the kitchen with warmth.
